about_the_game:
The Bucketlist Tourist is a thrilling multiplayer party game that takes photographic challenges to a new level.

In this exciting game, players compete for the best ratings on their photos. Each participant has their own remote shutter and a limited number of shots to showcase their best work.

Inspired by Europe's famous tourist attractions, the Bucketlist challenges lead players to vibrant, colorful locations. Together, they explore these places and take on various tasks.

At the end of each round, the photos are evaluated based on specific criteria, with the player who has the most creative and compelling snapshots emerging as the winner!

Features:
  • Play with friends and family on the couch and enjoy a shared gaming experience.
  • Challenge your friends by taking the best photos at stunning travel destinations.
  • Explore a variety of unique and picturesque locations around the world.
  • Experience a vibrant, colorful environment that is both challenging and entertaining.
  • Complete the tourist's bucket list by accomplishing a range of exciting and fun tasks.
  • Simple controls and intuitive mechanics that appeal to players of all ages.
  • Earn in-game currency through a high picture score to unlock new items, outfits, and accessories in the shop.
  • Play in competitive mode against your friends or work together to overcome challenges.
  • Personalize your tourist with different outfits and accessories.
Look forward to regular content and updates to keep the game fresh and exciting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750-Ti / AMD RX 550, 2GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, 4GB VRam / Intel Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: The Bucketlist Tourist is a physics-based multiplayer party game where players complete tasks and capture them photographically. In the battle for the best snapshot, they share only a single camera.
